page.title: 06TRANSPORT
page.content: In this area transport is confined to the road.Two traffic counts were taken in different parts of the area. 1) Padholm Rd. Wed.3/7/85 10.00-12.00 Cars-52 Vans-23 Lorries-7 Buses-2 2)Junction of Frank Perkins Way/Padholm Rd.Wed.10/7/85 10.00-12.00 Cars-87 Vans-21 Lorries-8 Buses-12 These two roads were counted because they are in the heart of the area and show two separate roads; 1)is a side road which links the Eastfield estate to the main Eastfields Rd.It has recently been made a cul-de-sac.2)is a major road serving Fengate Industry and it is part of the city ring-road.
